article_title: Meridian Police Investigating 5th Street Armed Robbery
article_text:
Meridian police are looking for a suspect in an armed robbery that happened early Monday morning.

It happened in the 4500 block of 5th Street about 1:30 in the morning. The victim says that two unknown black males stole cash from him and hit him the head with a gun. Police say the victim was treated at a local hospital for his injuries. Anyone with information about possible suspects in this case can call Meridian police.
